TopicTitle: Limited Probe Control even with connection

Articles.Content: I've sent a rover and a relay to duna twice and the first time everything worked well and I have full control as long as I had connection with the relay, but the second time, I did the same thing and now it says limited probe control even though a connection is there (82% connection which way way higher connection that the other rover had). Is this a glitch or am I doing something wrong?

Check these things:

  • Is the probe core hibernating? Switch it to active mode.
  • Do you have battery power in the rover? Deploy solar panels (or enable infinite power in the cheats menu ).

If you only have limited control but have a signal, those are the two biggest causes; try those and see if it starts working.
